FiGURE 5. ELEVATION OF TRUSSES

Design for Estimate



These trusses are deck trusses 43 feet center to center, with floorbeams

framing into verticals.

Dead Panel Loads—
Flooring 90 X 46.5 X 26 = 108,760 Ibs.
Crossbeams 45 X 52 X 4 = 9,360 ¢
Sidewalk, Railing, Curb, Etc. 380 X 26 = 9,880 “
Stringers 514 X 26 = 13,364 “
Floorbeam = 8,200 ¢
Trusses and Bracing 2360 X 26 = 61,350 ¢
210,914 “
Panel Load 210,914 + 2 = 105,500
Live Load—The live load on each truss is two lanes of H-20 loading:
Uniform live panel load—26 X 1280 lbs. = 33,280 lbs.
Concentrated live load— Moment = 36,000 lbs.
Concentrated live load— Shear = 52,000 lbs.

Sidewalk live load varies with loaded length as per specifications.
